Dragonfly/Perceptor::

"Ender, go to lab 23 and help Blacknightmare to deve=
lop an strategy for our next attack in our Agenda; Bullet, you should bette=
r rest a while, you aren't in condition to fight and after a while ask Cham=
eleon where's the training room, you will need to train a while... "

"Poor=
 Chameleon...!!!!" said a voice.

"Shut up, Dragonfly!!!!" called down Perc=
eptor and added " any one 
have other thing to say???"
